author: EXM7777
text:
i've known a few guys with $10M+ net worth... and they all share ONE thing:

they're all deep into the "woo-woo" stuff... all the mindset work

and when you ask them directly, they'll tell you this accounts for at least 50% of their success

personally, i'm not that invested in it

i studied the core concepts... natural law, compound effect, discipline fundamentals... but nothing beyond that

these guys are the absolute stereotype: meditation every morning, affirmations, daily journaling...

and it works incredibly well for them... they literally can't function without these practices anymore

maybe there's something there we're all missing
